titles.title: A bill to amend title XXVII of the Public Health Service Act to improve health care coverage under vision plans, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend title XXVII of the Public Health Service Act to improve health care coverage under vision plans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
